segments.text: This is the first time for me to have a Chinese guest . I hope you like western cooking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I like it very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cooking is a hobby with me . I'm always trying to think up new recipes . I hope you like the soup . It's kind of a specialty of mine , so I hope you enjoy it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your compliment.Won ' t you try this fish with white sauce ? I'm rather round of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What sort of western food do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like beefsteak very much . Have you tried Chinese dishes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I find the Chinese dishes wonderful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's getting late . I have to get up early tomorrow . So I must say good night .
segments.speaker: S2
